00055 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00056 //
00057 // Commentary:
00058 //
00059 // a replacement random_sample function 
00060 // suitable for use with systems which dont have it.
00061 //
00062 // This code was taken from the SGI STL.
00063 // and modified for it to work.
00064 // The modification was to replace "__random_number(__t) with
00065 // "rand()%__t" as the former is an internal SGI-only STL call.
00066 //
00067 // You will want something like the following in your file:
00068 // #ifdef _WIN32
00069 //   #include "affy_random_sample.h"
00070 // #else
00071 //   #include <ext/algorithm>
00072 // #endif
00073 //
00074 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 
00076 #ifndef __AFFY_RANDOM_SAMPLE_H_
00077 #define __AFFY_RANDOM_SAMPLE_H_
00078 
00079 #include <cstdio>
00080 #include <cstdlib>
00081 //
00082 
00083 template <class _InputIter, class _RandomAccessIter, class _Distance>
00084 _RandomAccessIter __random_sample(_InputIter __first, _InputIter __last,
00085                                   _RandomAccessIter out,
00086                                   const _Distance __n)
00087 {
00088   _Distance __m = 0;
00089   _Distance __t = __n;
00090   for ( ; __first != __last && __m < __n; ++__m, ++__first) 
00091     out[__m] = *__first;
00092 
00093   while (__first != __last) {
00094     ++__t;
00095     //_Distance __M = __random_number(__t);
00096     _Distance __M = (rand()%__t);
00097     if (__M < __n)
00098       out[__M] = *__first;
00099     ++__first;
00100   }
00101 
00102   return out + __m;
00103 }
00104 
00105 template <class _InputIter, class _RandomAccessIter>
00106 inline _RandomAccessIter
00107 affy_random_sample(_InputIter __first, _InputIter __last,
00108               _RandomAccessIter __out_first, _RandomAccessIter __out_last) 
00109 {
00110   //__STL_REQUIRES(_InputIter, _InputIterator);
00111   //__STL_REQUIRES(_RandomAccessIter, _Mutable_RandomAccessIterator);
00112   return __random_sample(__first, __last,
00113                          __out_first, __out_last - __out_first);
00114 }
00115 
00116 // Now we make it the replacement
00117 #define random_sample affy_random_sample
00118 
00119 #endif // __AFFY_RANDOM_SAMPLE_H_
